DOC.brief_title: Patient Navigation Tailored Treatment Planning Latina Patients With Breast Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . Successful navigation patient screen treated breast cancer continuum care ( visit visit ; surgical care radiologic care oncologic care ; oncologic care supportive care ; etc ) . II . Supply individualized in-language treatment summaries follow-up care plan enrol patient . III . Supply tailor in-language survivorship plan summary enrol patient . OUTLINE : Patients receive treatment summary plan report capture patient data use `` intake checklist '' complete initial consultation breast oncology team use guide referral exist service program generic information related disease treatment management plan . Additional element , psycho-social service , exercise , and/or nutrition , identify patient self-report , incorporate . Patients also complete 3 questionnaire clinic visit . After completion study , patient follow 6 month 12 month .
